resources.string: Mapper is not registered for class %s. Register Mapper in WellConfig or consider overloaded method WellSql.insert(T, Mapper)
Can\'t find class %sTable. Check whether you annotated your model with @Table. If you haven\'t rebuilt your project after putting annotations - do it now and try again.
Can\'t downgrade database from version %1$d to %2$d. Consider implementing method getOnDowngradeListener of interface WellConfig
Generated classes not found. Try to rebuild your project or check whether you whether you forgot to annotate your model classes with @Table.
